items.sentence: You\'re all responsible for what happened to me.
Tom is married to a woman who grew up in Boston.
I\'ve been feeling sick for the last three days.
I\'ve been listening to the Beatles all morning.
Could you please put this book on the top shelf?
If you want to pass the exam, you need to study.
Tom heard a strange noise coming from the attic.
Tom heard the door open and wondered who it was.
I still don\'t have enough money to buy a house.
I still don\'t understand what needs to be done.
